channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Criticism of ‘Woke AI’ Suggests ChatGPT Could Be a Trump Administration Target
item.description: If you think the United States is politically divided now, just wait for the AI culture wars.

item.title: ‘We’re a Fortress Now’: The Militarization of US Elections Is Here
item.description: From bulletproof glass, drones, and snipers to boulders blocking election offices, the US democratic system is bracing for violent attacks in 2024.

item.title: The Best Spooky Tech for Your Halloween Smart Home: Smart Bulbs, Projectors, and More
